fact: Ducks have waterproof feathers due to a special oil they produce.
Ducks can sleep with one eye open to stay alert for predators.
A group of ducks is called a raft, team, or paddling.
Male ducks are called drakes, and females are called hens.
Ducks can live up to 10 years in the wild.
Ducks are omnivorous and will eat grass, aquatic plants, insects, seeds, fruit, fish, crustaceans and other types of food.
